indicator_available: International Labour Organisation (ILO) estimates based on country data compiled through the ILO Social Security Inquiry (SSI).
goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals metadata for target 1.3
computation_definitions: The Social Security Inquiry (SSI) questionnaire has become the main comprehensive tool used to compile data on social protection coverage for children, unemployed persons, older persons, persons with disabilities, pregnant women, newborns, work-injury victims, and the poor and vulnerable.

graph_titles.series: Proportion of population covered by at least one social protection benefit
graph_titles.title: Proportion of population covered by at least one social protection benefit

graph_titles.series: Proportion of children/households receiving child/family cash benefit
graph_titles.title: Proportion of children/households receiving child/family cash benefit

graph_titles.series: Proportion of mothers with newborns receiving maternity cash benefit
graph_titles.title: Proportion of mothers with newborns receiving maternity cash benefit

graph_titles.series: Proportion of population above statutory pensionable age receiving a pension
graph_titles.title: Proportion of population above statutory pensionable age receiving a pension

graph_titles.series: Proportion of poor population receiving social assistance cash benefit
graph_titles.title: Proportion of poor population receiving social assistance cash benefit

graph_titles.series: Proportion of unemployed persons receiving unemployment cash benefit
graph_titles.title: Proportion of unemployed persons receiving unemployment cash benefit

graph_titles.series: Proportion of vulnerable population receiving social assistance cash benefit
graph_titles.title: Proportion of vulnerable population receiving social assistance cash benefit

graph_titles.series: Proportion of employed population covered in the event of work injury
graph_titles.title: Proportion of employed population covered in the event of work injury

graph_titles.title: Proportion of population with severe disabilities receiving disability cash benefit

source_next_release_1: TBC: We plan to update indicator data within 4 months of data being released
source_other_info_1:
The Social Security Inquiry (SSI) is produced by Social Protection Department (SOCPRO) of the International Labour Office (ILO). SSI is a set of questionnaires and a database, which is the main source of global data on social protection, used daily by policy makers, officials of international organizations and researchers.

For the methodological manual and the SSI questionnaire please visit Social Protection.
other_info: Data follows the UN specification for this indicator.
